title: 4 Simple Steps to Make Gruel for Food or Fuel in Conan Exiles

steps.title: Make a campfire.
steps.content: Make a campfire. You get the ability to craft a campfire at level 3, but you can also make gruel in a bonfire, charcoal kiln, large campfire, spit roast campfire, or Yamatai hearth.

steps.title: Gather seeds and plant fiber.
steps.content: Gather seeds and plant fiber. You'll need these two ingredients to make gruel, and you can get them both from interacting with plants. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Place 5 plant fiber, 1 seed, and fuel in your campfire.
steps.content: Place 5 plant fiber, 1 seed, and fuel in your campfire. You must use another fuel source, such as wood; otherwise your campfire will use your fiber as fuel.

steps.title: Press the "Play" button (triangle icon).
steps.content: Press the "Play" button (triangle icon). This will be at the top of the campfire menu. Your campfire will then convert the 5 plant fiber and 1 seed into 10 gruel.
